Ingredients.1: 1 pound beef sirloin steak, cut into thin strips

Directions.1: Combine steak strips, soy sauce, steak seasoning, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and liquid smoke in a resealable plastic bag. Marinate for at least 8 hours, or overnight.

Directions.2: Measure skewers to fit across the air fryer basket, slightly overlapping the edge. Trim off excess length.

Directions.3: Preheat the air fryer to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C) for 10 minutes.

Directions.4: Thread beef strips onto skewers, leaving room in between each strip, while the air fryer is preheating.

Directions.5: Air fry for 2 hours. Adjust cooking time as most air fryers have a maximum setting of 30 minutes. Rearrange the skewers during the reset time.

Directions.6: Reduce temperature to 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). Air fry for an additional 15 minutes.

Directions.7: Remove strips to a paper towel-lined storage container. Seal. Allow to rest overnight before serving.
